        public ServerConnection(java.net.Socket socket,
                        int cacheSize,
                        java.lang.String displacementStrategy,
                        Metadata metadata,
                        org.apache.log4j.Logger logger)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This class handles the connection to the server.
        Parameters:
        input - Input stream of the connected kvserver socket.
        output - Output stream of the connected kvserver socket.
        cacheSize - cacheSize of the KVServer.
        displacementStrategy - displacementStrategy of the KVServer.
        metadata - Metadata of the ECS,
        logger - Logger of the ECS.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
